name: Facial Makeup
description: It's no secret that a good face is the foundation of a great look. Whether you're looking for the perfect concealer to cover up a blemish or an eye shadow palette to create a flawless, everyday look, the right.

name: Eye Makeup
description: Perfect for those with sensitive eyes, this non-irritating, waterproof formula has a light, creamy texture that won't clog pores. With the perfect amount of coverage, this makeup won't flake or smudge.

name: Hair Styling
description: With the perfect blend of a light hold and a smooth finish, Dove Advanced Hair Series is perfect for any hair type. The light-weight formula leaves hair feeling silky and soft, and leaves hair looking sleek.

name: Wedding Makeup
description: Wedding Makeup It's not easy to find the perfect wedding makeup, but this collection is perfect for the bride who wants to look her best on her big day. With a variety of shades and formulas.

name: Fashion Makeup
description: In the latest issue of InStyle, the beauty editor shares her favorite products for achieving a fresh-faced look. Start with a primer, like L'Oreal Paris Infallible Pro-Matte Foundation Primer.

name: Enents Makeup
description: Enents Makeup is perfect for the woman who wants to be confident in her skin and doesn't want to spend hours in the morning to achieve a flawless look. With a variety of shades.
